text: The men's hammer throw event at the 1970 Summer Universiade was held at the Stadio Comunale in Turin on 4 September 1970. ==Records== {| class="wikitable" width=65% |- !colspan="5"|Standing records prior to the 1970 Summer Universiade |- |World record | |75.48 |Rovno, Soviet Union |12 October 1969 |- |Universiade record | |67.74 |Budapest, Hungary |August 1965 |} ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
